[2/7/2022, 1:49:27â€¯PM] ~â€¯Deepti: What happens to compulsory testings during a typhoon?

Testing is postponed if the Hong Kong Observatory issues a Signal 3 warning or higher. Testing centres and mobile specimen collection centres are closed.

https://thehkhub.com/what-happens-to-compulsory-covid-19-testing-during-a-hong-kong-typhoon/

[2/7/2022, 8:40:55â€¯PM] ~â€¯Sanjay Surana: SOHAMNA ORGANICS Garam Masala is a blend of common grounded spices. Organic Garam Masala is a healthy ingredient for all Indian dishes, as it is a mixture obtained from natural herbs and spices. Garam Masala is a warm, North Indian spice blend that features robust spices like cardamom, cinnamon, cloves and cumin. Using this unique blend can save the time it takes to make authentic masala while delivering the same great flavour. Garam masala is added to soups and stews, used as a rub for vegetables or dairy products like paneer or sprinkled before serving.

Ways to USE :-

ğŸ‘‰ğŸ»It is used as a standard spice mixture in most Indian curries and stews. It brings authenticity to Indian dishes and makes them spicy and flavourful.

[12/7/2022, 12:07:44â€¯AM] ~â€¯Deepti: Her right of abode will be revoked, but she will atill have right to land. Better for her to take an earlier flight
[12/7/2022, 12:09:31â€¯AM] ~â€¯Panna Modi: He may also contact immigration to make this clarification. They might consider this as special case due to covid
[12/7/2022, 12:13:05â€¯AM] ~â€¯Kiran Punjabi Raichura: They are not making any exceptions. I have contacted them multiple times because during covid there were flight bans too. Your right of abode gets revoked if you have not returned to hk in 3years but you still have the right to land... Which means you can still live and work here.
[12/7/2022, 12:13:34â€¯AM] ~â€¯Panna Modi: OK2.
[12/7/2022, 12:14:01â€¯AM] ~â€¯Kiran Punjabi Raichura: https://www.immd.gov.hk/eng/services/roa/term.html
[12/7/2022, 12:14:04â€¯AM] ~â€¯Kiran Punjabi Raichura: Right to Land
If a person loses his/her right of abode in the HKSAR he/she will automatically acquire the right to land in the HKSAR in accordance with the law, which will allow he/she enjoys the right:

To land in the HKSAR;
To be free from any condition of stay (including a limit of stay) in the HKSAR; and
Not to be removed from the HKSAR.
He/She will be able to enter the HKSAR freely to live, study and work without any restriction.

[14/7/2022, 8:02:45â€¯PM] ~â€¯STAY POSITIVE IN LIFE: https://www.thestandard.com.hk/breaking-news/section/4/192247/Citizens-angry-as-many-ineligible-for-Consumption-Voucher

The second phase of the Consumption Voucher Scheme will be issued on August 7. A reader of Sing Tao Daily, surnamed Wong, complained that she was told by the government she doesnâ€™t have the eligibility to receive the vouchers.

As Wong sought to immigrate in 2011, she has withdrawn the Mandatory Provident Fund (MPF). She flew back the next year and works in Hong Kong for the last ten years. She keeps paying the taxes as well as contributing to a new MPF. 

Wong is angry and annoyed after an official SMS telling her she is ineligible for the Consumption Voucher.

The government stated that if citizens have permanently left Hong Kong or are intending to leave Hong Kong, they will lose their eligibility for the consumption voucher. A spokesperson added that some may lose their eligibility if they applied to withdraw their MPF early due to permanent departure from the city.

[16/7/2022, 8:55:08â€¯AM] ~â€¯STAY POSITIVE IN LIFE: Who can notarize documents in Hong Kong?
Notary Public

Who can notarise in Hong Kong? Generally, a Notary Public may be described as an officer of the law whose public office duty it is to draw up, attest or certify certain documents under their signature and official seal. Notaries Public are usually experienced solicitors who have been practicing for at least 7 years.
[16/7/2022, 8:56:36â€¯AM] ~â€¯STAY POSITIVE IN LIFE: How can I get notarized in Hong Kong?

There are two ways in which a document can be authenticated. One is to go through a Notary Public to notarize, the other is to apostille with a seal from the High Court. To help you understand the Notarization process in Hong Kong, and the specific documents required , this article has been specially prepared for you.

Today is the day for *Real Estate Advertisements*. Following rules must be followed for all postings:

1. Advertisements can only be posted on *Fridays betweenÂ 6.00 AMÂ andÂ 6.00 PM*. 

2. Please *do not post on other days.* 

3. *Do not send advertisements directly to Admins*. 

4. One member can post a *SHORT MESSAGE* about their Real Estate listing. *No photos or videos are allowed.*

5. Please note that *only direct owner-based listings (without the involvement of any agents and/or commission, etc.)* is permitted.

6.Â Advertisements will be forwarded to other groups. *Message must have a name and a mobile number as part of the message/post.*

7. The help group Admins or it's members are not responsible if the deal goes bad or for any other issues asÂ it is the buyer's responsibility to verify before renting or purchase of real estate. 

Any member found flouting the above mentioned rules may be *removed by the admin without prior notice*

Apostille Convention and Legalisation

The Hague Convention Abolishing the Requirement for Legalisation for Foreign Public Documents, the Apostille convention, or the Apostille treaty is an international treaty drafted by the Hague Conference on Private International Law. Some documents for use overseas may requireÂ Apostille. Â Notary clients may also authorise us to deal withÂ Apostille or legalisation, when required ...

DetailÂ 

Document Types for Notary Public Services

ï¿¼

You may need a Notary Public on the following. But basically, it is often required by an oversea authority/party, involving your identity or the reliability of a document:

To certify identity or documents e.g. passports, marriage certificate, birth certificate, graduation diploma etc

To attest or witness a signature

When dealing with international business transactions

When buying, selling or mortgaging property abroad

To witness Powers of Attorney

When setting up a business or company abroad

To sponsor relatives from abroad

To appoint guardian when children study abroad e.g. Canada etc.Â 

When adopting children

When dealing with travel documentation and work permits

 *MAJOR CHANGES TO REAL ESTATE AND BUSINESS ADVERTISING* 

Effective from 1st September 2022, *all business and real estate advertisers must make a *minimum deposit of HKD200 to a REGISTERED CHARITABLE ORGANIZATION* UNDER IRD ORDINANCE 88, in order to post their advertisement in the Help Group.

Please note that *NO money* should be transferred to any of the admins nor do the admins gain any financial incentive from this plan of action.  This step is just in line with the long-term endeavour of the Help Group to continually extend helping hands to people in need. 

Posting details: 

â€¢	All form of advertising (Rental or business) can be done *ANY NUMBER OF TIMES* after making the charitable donation FOR EACH TIME you want us to post. It cannot be posted directly by you /others except ADMINS.

â€¢	From 1st September 2022, No more Fridays and once in a month advertisement issue as sometimes few misses the day.

â€¢	Minimum HKD200 to be paid to the charitable organization for each advertisement (*ONETIME PAYMENT = ONETIME ADVERTISEMENT PERMITTED*). 

â€¢	For all remittances made, kindly mention â€œHELP GROUPâ€ so that the charitable organization is aware of the source. 

â€¢	Following registered charitable organizations run by Indians are recommended (alphabetical order), but *you are free to contribute to any REGISTERED CHARITABLE ORGANIZATION*

 *MAJOR CHANGES TO REAL ESTATE AND BUSINESS ADVERTISING* 

Effective from 1st September 2022, all business and real estate advertisers must make a *minimum deposit of HKD200 to a CHARITABLE ORGANIZATION registered UNDER section 88, Inland Revenue Department Cap. 112* in order to post their advertisement in the Help Group.

Please note that *NO money should be transferred to any of the admins* nor do the admins gain any financial incentive from this plan of action.  This step is just in line with the long-term endeavor of the Help Group to continually extend helping hands to people in need. 

Posting details: 

â€¢	All forms of advertising (Rent /Sell residential /commercial property or promote your products/service / any commercial activity and second hand sales) can be done ONLY upon making a charitable donation of HKD200 (minimum value per donation). It cannot be posted directly by you /others except ADMINS.

â€¢	Only one photo with or without a short message containing contact information is allowed. No videos, pdfs, documents allowed. 

â€¢	Minimum HKD200 to be paid to the charitable organization for each advertisement (ONETIME PAYMENT = ONETIME ADVERTISEMENT PERMITTED).

â€¢	One-time donations made of a larger value (greater than HKD200) cannot be used for multiple advertisement postings. The admins do not have the scope to keep a record of the pending amount in the donations made with the number of advertisements posted. (ONETIME PAYMENT of HKD200 or more = ONETIME ADVERTISEMENT PERMITTED).

â€¢	From 1st September 2022, no more Fridays and once in a month advertisement issue as sometimes few misses the day. Advertisements can be posted on any day of the month depending on the charitable donation made. 

â€¢	For all remittances made, kindly mention â€œHELP GROUPâ€ so that the charitable organization is aware of the source. 

â€¢	Following registered charitable organizations run by Indians are recommended (alphabetical order), but you are free to contribute to any REGISTERED CHARITABLE ORGANIZATION

1. *BE THE CHANGE HONG KONG LIMITED* (w.e.f. 09.10.2020)
https://www.bethechangehk.org/donations/

[2/8/2022, 12:59:26â€¯PM] ~â€¯Deepti: Dear All
Complete details as requested by many 

This is prepared by *Ms. Deepthi* - for our HELP GROUP members .  She is one of the ADMINS of our Flight group and also  she helped many stranded Indians on expired visa issues teaming up with Ms. Betty 

*Thanking her for offering help and taking time to prepare this -on behalf of HELP GROUP ADMINS TEAM*


School allocation:

*a. Initiation program b. Primary School c. Secondary school*

â€¢ WHAT IS INITIATION PROGRAM?
Induction Programme for Newly Arrived Children

To help the newly arrived children cope with adjustment problems and learning difficulties which they generally encounter when they are newly joining the local education system, the Education Bureau has introduced an Induction Programme for the children newly arrived from the Mainland and for the newly arrived non-Chinese speaking (NCS) children & returnee children since April 1995 and October 2000 respectively.


â€¢ Links to check for initiation program :

â€¢ INTRODUCTION: https://www.edb.gov.hk/en/student-parents/newly-arrived-children/about-newly-arrived-children/index.html

â€¢ ALL INFO REGARDING INITIATION PROGRAM IS IN THE ABOVE LINK.

â€¢ SCHOOL LIST IN THE INITIATION PROGRAM: https://www.edb.gov.hk/en/student-parents/newly-arrived-children/initiation-program/school-list.html

*REGULAR SCHOOL FOR PRIMARY AND SECONDARY:*

*TYPES OF SCHOOL IN HONG KONG* :  
a.  Government school
b. Direct Subsidy Schools
c. Private Schools
e. International Schools

â€¢ LINK TO CHECK SCHOOL INFORMATION AND SCHOOL DETAILS: https://www.edb.gov.hk/en/student-parents/sch-info/sch-search/index.html

â€¢ INFORMATION WITHIN THE ABOVE LINK: 

- Kindergarten, Primary & Secondary School Profiles
- School Information Search & School Lists
- Education for Non-Chinese Speaking Children
- Information Sheet and Prospectus 
- Fees & Charges in Schools
- School Fees of DSS Schools
- Incorporated Management Committee (IMC)
- School Management Committee
- Vacancy Situation of Schools

â€¢ LINK TO CHECKLIST OF SCHOOLS BY DISTRICT: https://www.edb.gov.hk/en/student-parents/sch-info/sch-search/schlist-by-district/index.html

â€¢ INFORMATION WITHIN THE ABOVE LINK:
- School Search (Schools which are not yet registered are excluded)
- School Lists (By District) (2020/21)
- List of "Through-train" Schools
- List of Schools Offering Full-time Initiation Programme for Newly Arrived Children


- THE ABOVE INFORMATION IS VERY DETAILED GIVING INFOR ABOUT TYPE OF SCHOOL, STRUCTURE OF EDUCATION, SUBJECTS IN THE LANGUAGE TAUGHT. 

- YOU ALSO HAVE A SEARCH OPTION WITHIN THE LINK TO CHECK SPECIFIC DETAILS. 

- EDB is very forthcoming and very helpful, you can always approach them for any information and they are happy to guide you through the way.

*Contact for EDB:*

>1. Can connect with EDB by sending a query on this *link* 
https://www.edb.gov.hk/en/contact-us/index.html

>2. *Email*
edbinfo@edb.gov.hk (for enquiries) or edbcomp@edb.gov.hk (for complaints)

>3. Or by *personally meeting* them at the below address

Address
15/F, Wu Chung House 
213 Queen's Road East 
Wan Chai, Hong Kong

>4. OR *CALLING* THEM AT :

Tel
(852) 2891 0088

(852) 2893 0858

[13/8/2022, 11:04:28â€¯PM] ~â€¯Raghav Rao: *Admin Message*

 *MAJOR CHANGES TO REAL ESTATE AND BUSINESS ADVERTISING* 

Effective from 1st September 2022, all business and real estate advertisers must make a *minimum deposit of HKD50 to a CHARITABLE ORGANIZATION registered UNDER section 88, Inland Revenue Department Cap. 112* in order to post their advertisement in the Help Group.

Please note that *NO money should be transferred to any of the admins* nor do the admins gain any financial incentive from this plan of action.  This step is just in line with the long-term endeavor of the Help Group to continually extend helping hands to people in need. 

Posting details: 

â€¢	All forms of advertising (Rent /Sell residential /commercial property or promote your products/service / any commercial activity and second hand sales) can be done ONLY upon making a charitable donation of HKD50 (minimum value per donation). It cannot be posted directly by you /others except ADMINS.

â€¢	Only one photo with or without a short message containing contact information is allowed. No videos, pdfs, documents allowed. 

â€¢	Minimum HKD50 to be paid to the charitable organization for each advertisement (ONETIME PAYMENT = ONETIME ADVERTISEMENT PERMITTED).

â€¢	One-time donations made of a larger value (greater than HKD50) cannot be used for multiple advertisement postings. The admins do not have the scope to keep a record of the pending amount in the donations made with the number of advertisements posted. (ONETIME PAYMENT of HKD50 or more = ONETIME ADVERTISEMENT PERMITTED).

â€¢	From 1st September 2022, no more Fridays and once in a month advertisement issue as sometimes few misses the day. Advertisements can be posted on any day of the month depending on the charitable donation made. 

â€¢	For all remittances made, kindly mention â€œHELP GROUPâ€ so that the charitable organization is aware of the source. 

â€¢	Following registered charitable organizations run by Indians are recommended (alphabetical order), but you are free to contribute to any REGISTERED CHARITABLE ORGANIZATION

1. *BE THE CHANGE HONG KONG LIMITED* (w.e.f. 09.10.2020)
https://www.bethechangehk.org/donations/

wa.me/85294607377

â€¢	Complete list of all registered charitable organizations in HK: https://www.ird.gov.hk/eng/pdf/s88list_emb.pdf

[17/8/2022, 1:16:05â€¯PM] ~â€¯Raghav Rao: *Admin Message*

 *MAJOR CHANGES TO REAL ESTATE AND BUSINESS ADVERTISING* 

Effective from 1st September 2022, all business and real estate advertisers must make a *minimum deposit of HKD50 to a CHARITABLE ORGANIZATION registered UNDER section 88, Inland Revenue Department Cap. 112* in order to post their advertisement in the Help Group.

Please note that *NO money should be transferred to any of the admins* nor do the admins gain any financial incentive from this plan of action.  This step is just in line with the long-term endeavor of the Help Group to continually extend helping hands to people in need. 

Posting details: 

â€¢	All forms of advertising (Rent /Sell residential /commercial property or promote your products/service / any commercial activity and second hand sales) can be done ONLY upon making a charitable donation of HKD50 (minimum value per donation). It cannot be posted directly by you /others except ADMINS.

â€¢	Only one photo with or without a short message containing contact information is allowed. No videos, pdfs, documents allowed. 

â€¢	Minimum HKD50 to be paid to the charitable organization for each advertisement (ONETIME PAYMENT = ONETIME ADVERTISEMENT PERMITTED).

â€¢	One-time donations made of a larger value (greater than HKD50) cannot be used for multiple advertisement postings. The admins do not have the scope to keep a record of the pending amount in the donations made with the number of advertisements posted. (ONETIME PAYMENT of HKD50 or more = ONETIME ADVERTISEMENT PERMITTED).

â€¢	From 1st September 2022, no more Fridays and once in a month advertisement issue as sometimes few misses the day. Advertisements can be posted on any day of the month depending on the charitable donation made. 

â€¢	For all remittances made, kindly mention â€œHELP GROUPâ€ so that the charitable organization is aware of the source. 

â€¢	Following registered charitable organizations run by Indians are recommended (alphabetical order), but you are free to contribute to any REGISTERED CHARITABLE ORGANIZATION

[20/8/2022, 4:39:39â€¯PM] ~â€¯Raghav Rao: *Admin Message*

 *MAJOR CHANGES TO REAL ESTATE AND BUSINESS ADVERTISING* 

Effective from 1st September 2022, all business and real estate advertisers must make a *minimum deposit of HKD50 to a CHARITABLE ORGANIZATION registered UNDER section 88, Inland Revenue Department Cap. 112* in order to post their advertisement in the Help Group.

Please note that *NO money should be transferred to any of the admins* nor do the admins gain any financial incentive from this plan of action.  This step is just in line with the long-term endeavor of the Help Group to continually extend helping hands to people in need. 

Posting details: 

â€¢	All forms of advertising (Rent /Sell residential /commercial property or promote your products/service / any commercial activity and second hand sales) can be done ONLY upon making a charitable donation of HKD50 (minimum value per donation). It cannot be posted directly by you /others except ADMINS.

â€¢	Only one photo with or without a short message containing contact information is allowed. No videos, pdfs, documents allowed. 

â€¢	Minimum HKD50 to be paid to the charitable organization for each advertisement (ONETIME PAYMENT = ONETIME ADVERTISEMENT PERMITTED).

â€¢	One-time donations made of a larger value (greater than HKD50) cannot be used for multiple advertisement postings. The admins do not have the scope to keep a record of the pending amount in the donations made with the number of advertisements posted. (ONETIME PAYMENT of HKD50 or more = ONETIME ADVERTISEMENT PERMITTED).

â€¢	From 1st September 2022, no more Fridays and once in a month advertisement issue as sometimes few misses the day. Advertisements can be posted on any day of the month depending on the charitable donation made. 

â€¢	For all remittances made, if possible,kindly mention â€œHELP GROUPâ€ so that the charitable organization is aware of the source. 

â€¢	Following registered charitable organizations run by Indians are recommended (alphabetical order), but you are free to contribute to any REGISTERED CHARITABLE ORGANIZATION

[27/8/2022, 11:31:35â€¯AM] ~â€¯Raghav Rao: *Admin Message*

 *MAJOR CHANGES TO REAL ESTATE AND BUSINESS ADVERTISING* 

Effective from 1st September 2022, all business and real estate advertisers must make a *minimum deposit of HKD50 to a CHARITABLE ORGANIZATION registered UNDER section 88, Inland Revenue Department Cap. 112* in order to post their advertisement in the Help Group.

Please note that *NO money should be transferred to any of the admins* nor do the admins gain any financial incentive from this plan of action.  This step is just in line with the long-term endeavor of the Help Group to continually extend helping hands to people in need. 

Posting details: 

â€¢	All forms of advertising (Rent /Sell residential /commercial property or promote your products/service / any commercial activity and second hand sales) can be done ONLY upon making a charitable donation of HKD50 (minimum value per donation). It cannot be posted directly by you /others except ADMINS.

â€¢	Only one photo with or without a short message containing contact information is allowed. No videos, pdfs, documents allowed. 

â€¢	Minimum HKD50 to be paid to the charitable organization for each advertisement (ONETIME PAYMENT = ONETIME ADVERTISEMENT PERMITTED).

â€¢	One-time donations made of a larger value (greater than HKD50) cannot be used for multiple advertisement postings. The admins do not have the scope to keep a record of the pending amount in the donations made with the number of advertisements posted. (ONETIME PAYMENT of HKD50 or more = ONETIME ADVERTISEMENT PERMITTED).

â€¢	From 1st September 2022, no more Fridays and once in a month advertisement issue as sometimes few misses the day. Advertisements can be posted on any day of the month depending on the charitable donation made. 

â€¢	For all remittances made, if possible,kindly mention â€œHELP GROUPâ€ so that the charitable organization is aware of the source. 

â€¢	Following registered charitable organizations run by Indians are recommended (alphabetical order), but you are free to contribute to any REGISTERED CHARITABLE ORGANIZATION

1. *BE THE CHANGE HONG KONG LIMITED* (w.e.f. 09.10.2020)
https://www.bethechangehk.org/donations/
+85292005797

2.*ERASE POVERTY* (HONG KONG w.e.f. 21.07.2012)
https://m.facebook.com/erasepovertyhk/#!/erasepovertyhk/
wa.me/85294607377

3. *HELP THE BLIND FOUNDATION LIMITED* (w.e.f. 14.01.2011)
https://www.helptheblindfoundation.org/donate/
85297543797 (regular call only)

4. *LIFELONG ANIMAL PROTECTION CHARITY LTD*.  (w.e.f 26.11.2003)

[28/8/2022, 8:27:35â€¯PM] ~â€¯STAY POSITIVE IN LIFE: How to use the service

Bring the parcel to a Post Office officer and get a Certificate of Posting for it.
Shipping label can also be prepared on "POST NOW" (send.hongkongpost.hk) or "EC-Ship" online platform (ec-ship.hongkongpost.hk) in advance.
Make sure to keep the Certificate of Posting until confirmation of delivery.

 *MAJOR CHANGES TO REAL ESTATE AND BUSINESS ADVERTISING* 

Effective from 1st September 2022, all business and real estate advertisers must make a *minimum deposit of HKD50 to a CHARITABLE ORGANIZATION registered UNDER section 88, Inland Revenue Department Cap. 112* in order to post their advertisement in the Help Group.

Please note that *NO money should be transferred to any of the admins* nor do the admins gain any financial incentive from this plan of action.  This step is just in line with the long-term endeavor of the Help Group to continually extend helping hands to people in need. 

Posting details: 

â€¢	All forms of advertising (Rent /Sell residential /commercial property or promote your products/service / any commercial activity and second hand sales) can be done ONLY upon making a charitable donation of HKD50 (minimum value per donation). It cannot be posted directly by you /others except ADMINS.

â€¢	Only one photo with or without a short message containing contact information is allowed. No videos, pdfs, documents allowed. 

â€¢	Minimum HKD50 to be paid to the charitable organization for each advertisement (ONETIME PAYMENT = ONETIME ADVERTISEMENT PERMITTED).

â€¢	One-time donations made of a larger value (greater than HKD50) cannot be used for multiple advertisement postings. The admins do not have the scope to keep a record of the pending amount in the donations made with the number of advertisements posted. (ONETIME PAYMENT of HKD50 or more = ONETIME ADVERTISEMENT PERMITTED).

â€¢	From 1st September 2022, no more Fridays and once in a month advertisement issue as sometimes few misses the day. Advertisements can be posted on any day of the month depending on the charitable donation made. 

â€¢	For all remittances made, if possible,kindly mention â€œHELP GROUPâ€ so that the charitable organization is aware of the source. 

â€¢	Following registered charitable organizations run by Indians are recommended (alphabetical order), but you are free to contribute to any REGISTERED CHARITABLE ORGANIZATION

1. *BE THE CHANGE HONG KONG LIMITED* (w.e.f. 09.10.2020)
https://www.bethechangehk.org/donations/
+85292005797

2.*ERASE POVERTY* (HONG KONG w.e.f. 21.07.2012)

wa.me/85294607377

https://www.helptheblindfoundation.org/donate/
85297543797 (regular call only)

4. *LIFELONG ANIMAL PROTECTION CHARITY LTD*.  (w.e.f 26.11.2003)

Pls Read below - if you have skipped last 10 /more postings












 *MAJOR CHANGES TO REAL ESTATE AND BUSINESS ADVERTISING* 

Effective from 1st September 2022, all business and real estate advertisers must make a *minimum deposit of HKD50 to a CHARITABLE ORGANIZATION registered UNDER section 88, Inland Revenue Department Cap. 112* in order to post their advertisement in the Help Group.

Please note that *NO money should be transferred to any of the admins* nor do the admins gain any financial incentive from this plan of action.  This step is just in line with the long-term endeavor of the Help Group to continually extend helping hands to people in need. 

Posting details: 

â€¢	All forms of advertising (Rent /Sell residential /commercial property or promote your products/service / any commercial activity and second hand sales) can be done ONLY upon making a charitable donation of HKD50 (minimum value per donation). It cannot be posted directly by you /others except ADMINS.

â€¢	Only one photo with or without a short message containing contact information is allowed. No videos, pdfs, documents allowed. 

â€¢	Minimum HKD50 to be paid to the charitable organization for each advertisement (ONETIME PAYMENT = ONETIME ADVERTISEMENT PERMITTED).

â€¢	One-time donations made of a larger value (greater than HKD50) cannot be used for multiple advertisement postings. The admins do not have the scope to keep a record of the pending amount in the donations made with the number of advertisements posted. (ONETIME PAYMENT of HKD50 or more = ONETIME ADVERTISEMENT PERMITTED).

â€¢	From 1st September 2022, no more Fridays and once in a month advertisement issue as sometimes few misses the day. Advertisements can be posted on any day of the month depending on the charitable donation made. 

â€¢	For all remittances made, if possible,kindly mention â€œHELP GROUPâ€ so that the charitable organization is aware of the source. 

â€¢	Following registered charitable organizations run by Indians are recommended (alphabetical order), but you are free to contribute to any REGISTERED CHARITABLE ORGANIZATION

[23/9/2022, 4:06:16â€¯PM] ~â€¯Shravs: John Lee Press Conference on Cancellation of Hotel Quarantine: 
Last updated at 1549 on 9/23: 

New Measures Introduced by Hong Kong Government. 
All arrivals at HKIA Quarantine measures will be changed to 0+3 effective Monday, Sep 26. 2
Pre-Flight PCR will be scrapped. This has been replaced by a RAT test to be taken within 24-hours of flight departure time. 
Unvaccinated or partially vaccinated Hong Kong Residents can return. 
No quota on return to Hong Kong Scheme 

0+3 Scheme: 
Quarantine hotels will be scrapped. 
People can return directly home or go to any hotel of his/her choice to undergo 3 day medical surveillance.
There will be a PCR test at the airport and there is no need to wait for the result. Test and Go arrangement. 
All passengers can use any form of public transport
After the airport test is negative an amber code will be sent to the handphone of the passenger. 
On day 3 after a negative PCR test a blue code will be sent to the passenger. 

Pre-Flight PCR will be scrapped:
RAT test must be taken within 24 hours of departure time. 

Unvaccinated Hong Kong Residents can return: 
Unvaccinated or those who have not completed their vaccinations can board a plane to Hong Kong. 
After they have landed in Hong Kong no special exemptions will be made. They will have to follow the current Hong Kong laws to get a vaccine pass like everyone else. 

The Hong Kong Government will not lie flat and they will continue to control the number of cases in the community. The Government plans to protect the elderly, children and the vulnerable. 

Hong Kong should be optimistic about controlling the epidemic. 

Professor Lo Chung Mau:

[23/9/2022, 9:44:00â€¯PM] ~â€¯Deepti: John Lee Press Conference on Cancellation of Hotel Quarantine: 

Last updated at 1620 on 9/23: 


Mr. John Lee: 

New Measures Introduced by Hong Kong Government. 

1) All arrivals at HKIA Quarantine measures will be changed to 0+3 effective Monday, Sep 26 at 0600hrs. 

2) Pre-Flight PCR will be scrapped. This has been replaced by a RAT test to be taken within 24-hours of flight departure time. There is a need for a Day 2, Day 4 and Day 6 PCR test. 

3) Unvaccinated or partially vaccinated Hong Kong Residents can return. 

4) No quota on return to Hong Kong Scheme 

------------------------------------------

0+3 Scheme: 

â€¢ Quarantine hotels will be scrapped. 

â€¢ People can return directly home or go to any hotel of his/her choice to undergo 3 day medical surveillance.

â€¢ There will be a PCR test at the airport and there is no need to wait for the result. Test and Go arrangement. 

â€¢ All passengers can use any form of public transport

â€¢ After the airport test is negative an amber code will be sent to the handphone of the passenger. 

â€¢ On day 3 after a negative PCR test a blue code will be sent to the passenger. 

â€¢ A daily rat test must be taken for the first 7 days too. 

â€¢ If positive you can quarantine at your hotel or home. If you home is not suitable, you can still choose to ask the Hong Kong Government to invite you to one of their quarantine facilities. 

------------------------------------------

Pre-Flight PCR will be scrapped:

â€¢ RAT test must be taken within 24 hours of departure time. 

â€¢ Sounds like it needs to the test needs to be uploaded to HKGOV prior to boarding. 

------------------------------------------

Unvaccinated Hong Kong Residents can return: 

â€¢ Unvaccinated or those who have not completed their vaccinations can board a plane to Hong Kong. 

â€¢ After they have landed in Hong Kong no special exemptions will be made. They will have to follow the current Hong Kong laws to get a vaccine pass like everyone else. 

The Hong Kong Government will not lie flat and they will continue to control the number of cases in the community. The Government plans to protect the elderly, children and the vulnerable. 

Hong Kong should be optimistic about controlling the epidemic. 

------------------------------------------

Professor Lo Chung-Mau: 

â€¢ Prof Lo has data that can show you why 0+3 will not increase risk compared to 0+0. 

â€¢ The one reason for 0+3 and the PCR tests is because The Hong Kong Government does not want new variants to enter the community.

â€¢ Hong Kong is following a science based approach 

â€¢ He thanks all those involved including the general public in taking vaccinations this year. The number of those fully vaccinated persons have greatly increased compared to earlier this year. 

â€¢ The young and old need extra protection. 

â€¢ The R value is currently less than 1 and community testing centers are seeing a downward trend. 

â€¢ Professor Lo believes the Omicron Ba. 5 spread is under control

â€¢ Starting 8/22 (3+4 Introduction Date) visitor numbers have increased. 

â€¢ About 3.3% of inbound visitors are positive compared to the earlier 4.7%

â€¢ Global figures are falling. 

â€¢ Law enforcement have not found any amber code persons trying to enter restricted premises.

 *MAJOR CHANGES TO REAL ESTATE AND BUSINESS ADVERTISING* 

Effective from 1st September 2022, all business and real estate advertisers must make a *minimum deposit of HKD50 to a CHARITABLE ORGANIZATION registered UNDER section 88, Inland Revenue Department Cap. 112* in order to post their advertisement in the Help Group.

Please note that *NO money should be transferred to any of the admins* nor do the admins gain any financial incentive from this plan of action.  This step is just in line with the long-term endeavor of the Help Group to continually extend helping hands to people in need. 

Posting details: 

â€¢	All forms of advertising (Rent /Sell residential /commercial property or promote your products/service / any commercial activity and second hand sales) can be done ONLY upon making a charitable donation of HKD50 (minimum value per donation). It cannot be posted directly by you /others except ADMINS.

â€¢	Only one photo with or without a short message containing contact information is allowed. No videos, pdfs, documents allowed. 

â€¢	Minimum HKD50 to be paid to the charitable organization for each advertisement (ONETIME PAYMENT = ONETIME ADVERTISEMENT PERMITTED).

â€¢	One-time donations made of a larger value (greater than HKD50) cannot be used for multiple advertisement postings. The admins do not have the scope to keep a record of the pending amount in the donations made with the number of advertisements posted. (ONETIME PAYMENT of HKD50 or more = ONETIME ADVERTISEMENT PERMITTED).

â€¢	From 1st September 2022, no more Fridays and once in a month advertisement issue as sometimes few misses the day. Advertisements can be posted on any day of the month depending on the charitable donation made. 

â€¢	For all remittances made, if possible,kindly mention â€œHELP GROUPâ€ so that the charitable organization is aware of the source. 

â€¢	Following registered charitable organizations run by Indians are recommended (alphabetical order), but you are free to contribute to any REGISTERED CHARITABLE ORGANIZATION

[7/10/2022, 11:46:11â€¯AM] ~â€¯Deepti: John Lee Press Conference on Cancellation of Hotel Quarantine: 

Last updated at 1620 on 9/23: 


Mr. John Lee: 

New Measures Introduced by Hong Kong Government. 

1) All arrivals at HKIA Quarantine measures will be changed to 0+3 effective Monday, Sep 26 at 0600hrs. 

2) Pre-Flight PCR will be scrapped. This has been replaced by a RAT test to be taken within 24-hours of flight departure time. There is a need for a Day 2, Day 4 and Day 6 PCR test. 

3) Unvaccinated or partially vaccinated Hong Kong Residents can return. 

4) No quota on return to Hong Kong Scheme 

------------------------------------------

0+3 Scheme: 

â€¢ Quarantine hotels will be scrapped. 

â€¢ People can return directly home or go to any hotel of his/her choice to undergo 3 day medical surveillance.

â€¢ There will be a PCR test at the airport and there is no need to wait for the result. Test and Go arrangement. 

â€¢ All passengers can use any form of public transport

â€¢ After the airport test is negative an amber code will be sent to the handphone of the passenger. 

â€¢ On day 3 after a negative PCR test a blue code will be sent to the passenger. 

â€¢ A daily rat test must be taken for the first 7 days too. 

â€¢ If positive you can quarantine at your hotel or home. If you home is not suitable, you can still choose to ask the Hong Kong Government to invite you to one of their quarantine facilities. 

------------------------------------------

Pre-Flight PCR will be scrapped:

â€¢ RAT test must be taken within 24 hours of departure time. 

â€¢ Sounds like it needs to the test needs to be uploaded to HKGOV prior to boarding. 

------------------------------------------

Unvaccinated Hong Kong Residents can return: 

â€¢ Unvaccinated or those who have not completed their vaccinations can board a plane to Hong Kong. 

â€¢ After they have landed in Hong Kong no special exemptions will be made. They will have to follow the current Hong Kong laws to get a vaccine pass like everyone else. 

The Hong Kong Government will not lie flat and they will continue to control the number of cases in the community. The Government plans to protect the elderly, children and the vulnerable. 

Hong Kong should be optimistic about controlling the epidemic. 

------------------------------------------

Professor Lo Chung-Mau: 

â€¢ Prof Lo has data that can show you why 0+3 will not increase risk compared to 0+0. 

â€¢ The one reason for 0+3 and the PCR tests is because The Hong Kong Government does not want new variants to enter the community.

â€¢ Hong Kong is following a science based approach 

â€¢ He thanks all those involved including the general public in taking vaccinations this year. The number of those fully vaccinated persons have greatly increased compared to earlier this year. 

â€¢ The young and old need extra protection. 

â€¢ The R value is currently less than 1 and community testing centers are seeing a downward trend. 

â€¢ Professor Lo believes the Omicron Ba. 5 spread is under control

â€¢ Starting 8/22 (3+4 Introduction Date) visitor numbers have increased. 

â€¢ About 3.3% of inbound visitors are positive compared to the earlier 4.7%

â€¢ Global figures are falling. 

â€¢ Law enforcement have not found any amber code persons trying to enter restricted premises. 

------------------------------------------

Mr. John Lee: 

â€¢ He wants to control the overall epidemic situation in an orderly way. 

â€¢ The Government will monitor the situation closely, so all the risks are controlled and things can progress in an orderly manner. 

â€¢ If there are positive developments as we progress, there will be more room for more activities to open up. 

â€¢ Visitors will come as we are a free economy, a place of opportunities, a place of east meets west, a place of success stories and a place where you can use HK to open a base to The Mainland. 

â€¢ After the 3rd day you can do everything a Hong Kong Citizen does including eat and drink out.

https://www.info.gov.hk/gia/general/202209/23/P2022092300651.htm

India has set up a *senior citizen help line phone no. 14567.*  My friend checked on this phone & he was pleasantly surprised by the response by a lady. This centre provides any help / support needed by senior citizens 24 hours. He was very impressed by the person who expressed concern with promise to immediate help. Suggest we circulate this info widely to help those in need of help.

[12/10/2022, 4:49:29â€¯PM] ~â€¯Nishant Shah: Re-entry into the HKSAR

Non-permanent residents of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region (HKSAR), irrespective of their nationality and type of travel document held, do not require a re-entry visa/entry permit to enter the HKSAR provided that they return within the currency of their permitted limit of stay and that the circumstances upon which they have acquired their residential status remain unchanged.

above is from immd website
https://www.immd.gov.hk/eng/services/visas/GEP.html#lastTab

[14/10/2022, 5:07:30â€¯PM] ~â€¯Sanjay Surana: *Admin Message*

- *NO MORE FREE ADVT*

*NO MORE PARTICULAR DAY*


Pls Read below - if you have skipped last 10 /more postings












 *MAJOR CHANGES TO REAL ESTATE AND BUSINESS ADVERTISING* 

Effective from 1st September 2022, all business and real estate advertisers must make a *minimum deposit of HKD50 to a CHARITABLE ORGANIZATION registered UNDER section 88, Inland Revenue Department Cap. 112* in order to post their advertisement in the Help Group.

Please note that *NO money should be transferred to any of the admins* nor do the admins gain any financial incentive from this plan of action.  This step is just in line with the long-term endeavor of the Help Group to continually extend helping hands to people in need. 

Posting details: 

â€¢	All forms of advertising (Rent /Sell residential /commercial property or promote your products/service / any commercial activity and second hand sales) can be done ONLY upon making a charitable donation of HKD50 (minimum value per donation). It cannot be posted directly by you /others except ADMINS.

â€¢	Only one photo with or without a short message containing contact information is allowed. No videos, pdfs, documents allowed. 

â€¢	Minimum HKD50 to be paid to the charitable organization for each advertisement (ONETIME PAYMENT = ONETIME ADVERTISEMENT PERMITTED).

â€¢	One-time donations made of a larger value (greater than HKD50) cannot be used for multiple advertisement postings. The admins do not have the scope to keep a record of the pending amount in the donations made with the number of advertisements posted. (ONETIME PAYMENT of HKD50 or more = ONETIME ADVERTISEMENT PERMITTED).

â€¢	From 1st September 2022, no more Fridays and once in a month advertisement issue as sometimes few misses the day. Advertisements can be posted on any day of the month depending on the charitable donation made. 

â€¢	For all remittances made, if possible,kindly mention â€œHELP GROUPâ€ so that the charitable organization is aware of the source. 

â€¢	Following registered charitable organizations run by Indians are recommended (alphabetical order), but you are free to contribute to any REGISTERED CHARITABLE ORGANIZATION

1. *BE THE CHANGE HONG KONG LIMITED* (w.e.f. 09.10.2020)
https://www.bethechangehk.org/donations/

[31/10/2022, 12:06:47â€¯AM] ~â€¯Kulbir Don Singh: As you may be aware, a person must have a "PCR testing registration code" to receive free PCR test on or after 1 November.

Otherwise you will be charged HK$150 or HK$240 per test.

To avoid incurring unnecessary cost, please complete the registration on or before 31 October (Mon) via your LeaveHomeSafe App, which is easy and quick:
1. Open your LeaveHomeSafe App
2. Slide to the right
3. The third page is "PCR Testing Registration Code"
4. Click and complete all the requested information (e.g. name, address, HKID)
5. Press "Confirmed" and then you will receive a QR Code
6. Registration completedâ€™
[31/10/2022, 12:25:55â€¯AM] ~â€¯Shravs: U need to do a RAT test 24hrs before ur flight departure. On arrival at HK Airport, once u get off the air craft they will do RT PCR test. You need to show the QR code generated by you by filling in all details before ur flight departure on the chp site.

Court document filing case is very nominal

There will no lawyers for any parties 
As both you and your land lord have to defend the case on your own

*Attention Mumbai Flat Owners, No NOC Needed From Housing Society To Sell/Rent Flats Now*  - Minister Shares BIG Update
Maharashtra Housing 

Minister Dr Jitendra Awhad said that as per the by-laws, the society's permissions are not required for owners to either sell/hire out their homes, yet many managing committees are insisting on their clearance â€“ Mumbai - 

In a big news for Mumbai flat owners, Maharashtra Housing Minister Dr Jitendra Awhad on Tuesday announced that from now on - no prior permission or no objection certificate (NOC) from a cooperative housing society would be necessary for owners wanting to sell/rent out their flats. 

This would enable the owners to conduct his/her rental/sale transactions without hassles or delays and prevent harassment by the society committees to green signal such proposals, the minister said - 

â€œWe have come to know that many housing societies discriminate on the basis of caste, creed, religion, community, vegetarians and donâ€™t permit the owners to sell/rent out their properties,â€ Dr Awhad said. 

He pointed out how in some societies or localities dominated by any particular community, certain communities are barred in the name of preferring only â€˜vegetariansâ€™, or preventing Dalits and Other Backward Classes, which is leading to increasing hatred among the people - 

He said as per the by-laws, the societyâ€™s permissions are not required for owners to either sell/hire out their homes, yet many managing committees are insisting on their clearance. 

â€œNow, if the owner wishes to sell-rent out his flat, he/she will not need the societyâ€™s NOC,â€  

Dr Awhad declared, justifying it on grounds of Mumbai being a leading cosmopolitan city in the world and such tactics were sullying the image of the countryâ€™s financial capital.

Decision welcomed by many - Several individuals, societies, and the Maharashtra Societies Welfare Association have approved and welcomed Dr Awhadâ€™s initiative, and urged that it should be formalised through a â€˜Government Resolutionâ€™ with punitive clauses for the errant societies/managing committee members.

- There have been many instances in the past when people, including many celebs, were barred from buying/selling flats in certain areas/housing societies under the garb of the NOC,  but now that will stop, said a Kandivali CHS Chairman, preferring anonymity. 

â€œConsequently, many lose out on a potentially lucrative deal, their transactions get delayed in the societal red-tapism, some societies even demand a certain amount of the deal as a â€˜donationâ€™ to the building funds, and there was harassment of both the buyers and the sellers on various counts,â€ he said.

Nov 17th â€“ DR. ALBERT AU PRESS CONFERENCE SUMMARY*

-------------------------------- 

*COVID-19 Update*

DR. AU UPDATE:

â€¢	There has been a 28.6% increase in total cases from the week before. 

â€¢	Imported cases have rise 5.7% from the week before. 

â€¢	Imported cases represents about 7% of all all cases in Hong Kong. 

â€¢	About 55% of imported cases are tested positive on arrival at HKIA. The remaining 45% test positive from days 1-7. 

â€¢	There are other variants being found locally now including XBB.

â€¢	Globally BQ.1 and XBB variants are on the rise.

â€¢	Case numbers are rising in care homes and schools. 

â€¢	Death raises remain stable. 

---------------------------------

*HOSPITAL AUTHORITY*

â€¢	Around 2300 Positive cases admitted in Hospital 

â€¢	Around 290 new patients admitted for Covid daily. 

â€¢	More than 90 patients in serious or critical condition. 

---------------------------------

*HKGOV Update*

Testing for passengers arriving in Hong Kong: 

Starting at 0001 hours on November 21, 2022

â€¢	All passengers arriving from outside Mainland China and Taiwan will be required to do two PCR tests. The first test will be administered on arrival at the airport on Day 0. The second PCR test will need to be taken on Day 2 at a community testing center. All passengers will still be required to conduct a RAT test from Days 1-7. 

â€¢	For passengers that arrive on Nov 21st and thereafter, you  will no longer be required to go and take a per test on Days 4 and Days 6.



*Vaccine Pass* 

â€¢	Beginning on Nov 30, those aged between 5-11 must have taken two doses of a vaccine.  Those aged 12 and above must have taken three doses of a vaccine to meet the vaccine pass requirement. 

â€¢	Those who have been issued a medical exemption certificate. These individuals may be deemed fit for vaccination after a medical assessment. If this is the case the a transitional vaccine pass will be issued. 



*BioNTech Bivalent Vaccine* 

â€¢	This new vaccine has been approved by the Government scientific committee on vaccines for emergency use.

â€¢	Hong Kong has procured this vaccine and the earliest arrival time is at the end of the month.

[18/11/2022, 2:32:33â€¯PM] ~â€¯STAY POSITIVE IN LIFE: https://www.timesofisrael.com/israeli-scientists-find-running-reduces-chance-of-some-cancers-by-72/

People who regularly run or engage in other aerobic exercise cut their chance of developing some cancers by 72 percent, according to research from Tel Aviv University.

Aerobic exercise makes some organs so efficient at grabbing sugar that is in the body that tumors are left starved of glucose, and often unable to grow and spread, the peer-reviewed study published last week suggested.

It focused on metastatic cancer, meaning cancer that has spread from its original location in the body. Researchers believe there are also strong benefits in preventing primary tumors, but focused on metastatic cancer as it is Israelâ€™s leading cause of death.


â€œPhysical activity is creating a hostile setting for tumors by creating an environment where it has difficulty obtaining glucose,â€ lead author Prof. Carmit Levy, from the Tel Aviv Universityâ€™s Department of Human Genetics and Biochemistry, told The Times of Israel.

â€œWe showed in this study that running and other aerobic activity protects the body from metastatic activity, and discovered what mechanism makes this happen.â€

[20/12/2022, 1:20:45â€¯PM] ~â€¯Kulbir Don Singh: Below is a piece I wrote about my turning to veganism. It won 2nd prize in the poem category of the Jasmina Awards 2022 (a writing competition for seniors). Please feel free to share with anyone who may relate with it.
[20/12/2022, 1:20:46â€¯PM] ~â€¯Kulbir Don Singh: *A CHANGE IN LATER LIFE*

In my 60s, and still going strong
Made a change hoping nothing would go wrong
Learning of animal cruelty, animal oppression
I decided to embrace the life of a vegan

The thought I reflected on
Which kept coming round
_â€˜Should my existence be hovering,_
_On the back of anotherâ€™s sufferingâ€™_ 

The slaughter of animals seemed in vain
I began to contemplate their pain
If not wanting the killing to prolong
Is veganism where I belong?

Denying animals moral consideration
Felt like a form of discrimination
Killing another 'species'
Could this be a moral disease?

Seeing animals as either food or pet
We eat one, the other we pat
Seeing a dying chicken, a dying cat
But could only save one, how would I act?

There are places they eat dogs and cats
Which pains us who think them pets
But let our thoughts a minute quicken
Whatâ€™s the difference between cat and chicken?

Due to culture, due to convenience
Less aware and with little lenience
We eat the flesh and secretions of animals
Compulsions present like life-long manacles

Factory farms caging poultry and mammals
Millions confined like creature criminals
Swine, poultry and cattle raised solely
For taste buds to say 'the meat tastes lovely'

The food industry converts animal bodies 
Into cheap food for modern societies 
Meat in a van, meat in a can
From boxes and shelves, straight to a pan

To avoid doing the killing ourselves
To avoid the blood, the noise, the smells
The slaughter happens far from dwellings and mansions
And even further from our thoughts and conscience

Dairy cows are artificially inseminated
To induce milk much awaited
Their babies wrenched away at birth
An experience like hell on earth	

Male calves are killed for veal
Widely considered a high-end meal
Females raised till their 'teens'
To replace their mums as milk machines

In a few years udders exhausted
Mothers to the slaughter house escorted
In a state of utmost grief
Killed, processed into cuts of beef

But animals are sentient beings
Having thoughts, emotions, and feelings
We see this in which we declare a pet
But not in those our appetite whet

Facing death whether pig or sheep
Will run, scream, resist or weep
A sign of lifeâ€™s longing for itself
For no being willingly gives up its self

But humans in a natural state
Empathise, love, care and relate
With all beings regardless whether
They walk, fly, crawl or slither

Thus, most cringe and look-away
At the sight of a life taken-away
So, we outsource the killing
To abattoirs since weâ€™re unwilling

Changing from 'lovely the meat I ate'
To being animal compassionate
Needed understanding and information
And lots of heartfelt inspiration

Rejecting meat curry
Which I used to eat in a hurry
For family to understand was difficult
They still look upon befuddled

Chicken, prawn, crab and fish,
Which I used to crave and wish
Do not appeal anymore
So now I easily ignore

Foods I eat now
Since I took this vow
Veggies, fruit, lentils, beans
Grains, nuts, seeds and greens

Eating only a plant cuisine
Some wonder if I lack protein
But look at the elephant, strong and big
Eats only grass, leaf and twig

Rejecting human exceptionalism
I now see all through an empathy prism
To have compassion for all in need
For human, or animal of any breed

But all said all done
My views are personal ones
To myself are they directed
As my inner voice and I stay connected

I can only be the change I want to see
And not compel others to agree
But with optimism and hope I foresee
The day will come when _all beings are set free_

*Raymund Jagan*

[28/12/2022, 5:06:02â€¯PM] ~â€¯Deepti: Dec 28 -Anti-epidemic Command and Coordination Group Press Conference hosted by Chief Executive, Mr. John Lee. 

Relaxation of Epidemic Measures: 

Effective at 0001hrs on December 29th, 2022. 

1.	Cancellation of Quarantine orders. The Govenment will no  longer going trace close contacts. Hong Kong Government will continue to give assistance and advice to those who test positive. 

2.	Cancellation of Vaccine Pass. The Hong Kong Government will continue to push for high vaccination rates within the community. 

3.	Cancellation of All PCR Testing. The cancellation will mean arrivals from everywhere including outside of Mainland China will no longer be required to test. Travelers will continue to be required to take a RAT test daily for 5 days after arriving in Hong Kong. 

4.	Cancellation of All Social Distancing Measures. 

5.	Masks mandate will remain. 



The Government has come to this conclusion after considering the following: 



1.	The very high vaccination rate of the population

2.	Over 2.5 million people have been previously infected with Covid 19

3.	Hong Kong has a sufficient supply of effective medications to treat Covid-19. 

4.	Health personnel understand how to deal with Covid-19 after three years of experience. 

5.	The Hospital Authority capacity to deal with Covid-19 has been greatly improved. 

6.	With 3 years of experience, Hong Kong people have a very good understanding and well equipped to protect themselves from Covid-19. 

7.	Anti-Epidemic Measures will focus on protecting high risk groups. These include those who live in elderly homes as well as the old and the young. 



These measures are to help Hong Kong return to normalcy. 



Professor Lo Chung-mau - Secretary of Health:



â€¢	The Government has been taking gradual steps to resume normalcy in Hong Kong. 



Quarantine Order and Close Contacts: 

1.	There will be no more defined close contacts and quarantine orders. We have been fighting the Covid-19 virus for three years and we have a high vaccination rate, an increasing level of immunity barrier within the community. The capacity to tackle the epidemic challenges has been enhanced. Family members of positive cases of confirmed cases and other closes contacts will not be placed under testing or quarantine arrangements. Department of Health will issue advice to positive cases as well as to their family members. 

2.	Quarantine orders will be stopped as of tomorrow and those in quarantine facilities will be released tomorrow. 

3.	Isolation arrangements for positive cases will remain the same. The Government will closely monitor the epidemic and will adjust the measures when necessary. 

4.	Government will no longer send out anti epidemic kits to close contacts. Confirmed cases will continue to receive anti epidemic kits. 



Vaccine Pass:

The Government has decided to cancel the vaccine pass system under Cap 599L. 

1.	Since the introduction, it has been effective and it has successfully raised the vaccination rate to a high level. 

2.	83% of residents in Hong Kong have had at least three doses.

3.	The Government will look for more targeted measures to the elderly and the young. 



Testing for inbound travelers: 

ALL PCR Testing has been cancelled. 

1.	Taking into account to resume the flow of people from Mainland and Hong Kong. 

2.	Hong Kong will streamline the rules to All travelers including those from Mainland China. 

3.	All Inbound travelers must do a RAT test 24 prior to departure of a PCR test no more than 48 hours prior to departure. 

4.	Health Declaration form will be cancelled however if the inbound traveler still wants to electronically submit one then he/she is free to do so. 

5.	A photograph copy of the travelers RAT or PCR result should be kept in case a health officer asks for proof during an inspection.

6.	Health advice will be issued to all arriving passengers. 

7.	A Rat test is required from Day 1-5 upon arrival. 



Social Distancing Measures: 

1.	All social distancing measures have been cancelled. 

2.	All measures under Cap 599F and Cap 599G will be removed.

3.	Mask mandate remains under Cap 599I. Mask wearing can protect yourself and those around you. Hong Kong is now in a high flu season. Experts believe that getting rid of the mask mandate will cause a lot of disease and The Government must protect the healthcare system. 



Arrangement of Local Medical Resources: 

1.	Local people will have priority in the healthcare system. 

2.	Hospital Authority (HA) has been enhancing its capacity.

3.	HA will continue ask private healthcare to support them. 

4.	Paxlovid and other drugs have been given to private clinics and hospitals. This can help lessen the burden on the public system

5.	HA will provide services and drugs to local residents. Tourists and non residents cannot use designated clinics. Non eligible persons will also provide treatment to urgent treatments and those will be charged a higher rate. 

6.	HA will keep a good supply of pain and fever medicine like paracetamol. Department of Health will make sure there is sufficient stock. 

7.	Private sector can now order the two types of covid medicines from the manufacturers. Those who are not Hong Kong residents will need to pay $6000. 

8.	The objective and policy is to make sure there is always a sufficient supply of vaccinations for Hong Kong Residents. 

9.	Government will not offer Government procured vaccines to non Hong Kong residents. Private sector may do so. 



Summary: 

1.	Covid transmission is still high if you look at the waste water samples. 

2.	Covid together with Flu will put pressure on the healthcare system. The old and young needs to be protected. 

3.	Sewage surveillance program will continue. 

4.	Random tests for genome sequencing will be carried out from testing centers to look for variants of concern. 

5.	Everyone needs to work together. 

â€¢	Get vaccinated 

â€¢	Wear your mask 

â€¢	Protect high risk groups.



Live Feed: 
https://webcast.info.gov.hk/revamp/eng/livecast.html

[29/12/2022, 12:14:58â€¯AM] ~â€¯Deepti: 28 Dec 20:01: COVID Control Measures For Arrivals (Govt P/R, translated from Chinese)

https://www.info.gov.hk/gia/general/202212/28/P2022122800679.htm

This press release affects passengers arrived since 27 Dec.

Effective from 29 Dec:

VACCINATION

â€¢	Must omplete a Suggested dosage (usually 2) of Recognised vaccines ( https://www.coronavirus.gov.hk/pdf/list_of_recognised_covid19_vaccines.pdf ). Exemption: 

1.	Aged 11 or lower - requirement waived

2.	Aged 12-17: One dose of BioNTech Comirnaty accepted

3.	Hong Kong Residents - requirement waived

4.	Arrivals who have only stayed in Mainland China and/or Macau in past 7 days - requirement waived

â€¢	(Provisional) Vaccine Pass will become obsolete and no longer issued



PRE-DEPARTURE TESTING

â€¢	Rapid Antigen / Lateral Flow Test (RAT): 24 hours before take off (or arrival at Border Control Point), can be administered by the passenger themselves.

â€¢	Result may be declared ( https://www.chp.gov.hk/hdf ); or must keep photo proof for a 90-day period for checking.

â€¢	Passengers may opt for PCR test within 48 hours before flight takes off / arrival at border.



AFTER TOUCH DOWN IN HONG KONG

â€¢	All PCR testing scrapped

â€¢	Last compulsory testing date = 28 Dec ("Day 2" tests after this date are cancelled from your Medical Surveillance Order)

â€¢	Arrivals will be advised to continue with the 5-day RAT when in Hong Kong.

â€¢	Positive RAT tests - You are encouraged to report at https://www.chp.gov.hk/ratp/ for an isolation order (minimum 5-day), a care pack and eligibility to book designated clinic at Hospital Authority.

[2/1/2023, 1:02:06â€¯AM] ~â€¯Deepti: Source from the below Fb group: 


https://www.facebook.com/groups/drchuangshukkwan/?ref=share&mibextid=S66gvF



Countries requiring testing from travelers from People's Republic of China: 

Last updated: January 1 - 2245 HKT 



Big thanks to Terence for helping me with this document. 

----------------------------

ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡ºAustralia:

Effective Date:      Jan 5, 2023

Travelers arriving from:    Mainland China, Hong Kong and Macau

Testing Requirement:    Negative Test 48-Hours Prior to Flight Departure.

More information:

https://www.health.gov.au/news/travellers-from-china-required-to-undertake-covid-19-testing-before-travel

----------------------------

ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡¦ Canada:

Effective Date:      Jan 5, 2023

Travelers arriving from:    Mainland China, Hong Kong and Macau

Testing Requirement:  Negative PCR or Supervised RAT Test 48-Hours Prior to Flight Departure.

More information:

https://www.canada.ca/en/public-health/news/2022/12/government-of-canada-announces-negative-covid-19-test-requirement-for-travellers-arriving-from-the-peoples-republic-of-china-hong-kong-or-macao-air.html

----------------------------

ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡· France

Effective Date:    Jan 5, 2023

Travelers arriving from:    Mainland China, Hong Kong and Macau

Testing Requirement:  Negative PCR or Supervised RAT Test 48-Hours Prior to Flight Departure.

Other Requirements:   Passenger must sign a sworn statement confirming they do not show any symptoms of infection. All passengers must also confirm they have not been identified as a close contact with a confirmed positive case. Passengers must also agree to be subject to further testing upon arrival in France.

Pre Travel Form:  https://hongkong.consulfrance.org/Health-measures-for-passengers-from-China-including-Hong-Kong-Macau?fbclid=IwAR2BRZjclXUxdmcse9Xx5bwV5yay6W646XejFJt4wEDSQswxhfpvZY8ptS4

Mask Requirement:   France requires all passengers aged 6 and above must wear a mask on the flight.

More information: https://www.legifrance.gouv.fr/jorf/id/JORFTEXT000046849260#:~:text=Le%20d%C3%A9cret%20impose%20ainsi%20aux,masque%20lors%20de%20ces%20vols.

----------------------------

ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡³ India

Effective Date:    Jan 1, 2023

Travelers arriving from:  Mainland China, Hong Kong, Macau Singapore, Thailand, and South Korea.

Testing Requirement:  Negative PCR or Supervised RAT Test 72-Hours Prior to Flight Departure.  2% of arriving passengers randomly

selected by the airline will be subject to testing on arrival

Other Requirements:   Must submit declaration and upload negative test to The Government of India online -  Air Suvidha portal at https://www.newdelhiairport.in

More information:

https://www.mohfw.gov.in/pdf/GuidelinesforInternationalArrivals29thDecember2022.pdf

----------------------------

ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡¹ Italy

Effective Date:    Dec, 28 2022

Travelers arriving from:  Mainland China

Testing Requirement:  Negative PCR or Supervised RAT Test 72-Hours Prior to Flight Departure.  Undergo RAT Test on arrival at the airport. If not available at the airport, passenger must take a RAT test at an approved clinic within 48-Hours of arrival at an approved clinic.

More information:

https://www.esteri.it/it/ministero/normativaonline/focus-cittadini-italiani-in-rientro-dall-estero-e-cittadini-stranieri-in-italia/

----------------------------

ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ Japan

Effective Date:    Dec, 30 2022

Travelers arriving from:  Mainland China

Testing Requirement:  Passengers will be tested upon arrival in Japan. If found to be positive, passengers will be placed into a designated quarantine facility.

Other Requirements:  All direct flights from Mainland China can only land at Tokyo/Narita, Tokyo/Haneda, Nagoya/Centrair, Osaka/Kansai International Airport.

More information:

https://www.mofa.go.jp/ca/fna/page4e_001053.html

----------------------------

ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡¦ Kingdom of Morocco

Effective Date:    Jan 3, 2023

Travelers arriving from:  Mainland China

Travel Ban:  Access has been prohibited to the territory of the Kingdom of Morocco to all travelers, regardless of their nationality, coming from the People's Republic of China.

More information:

https://www.diplomatie.ma/en/statement-5

----------------------------

ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡· Republic of Korea

Effective Date:    Jan 5, 2023

Travelers arriving from:  Mainland China

Testing Requirement:  Negative PCR Test 48-Hours Prior to Departure or Supervised RAT Test 24-Hours Prior to Flight Departure. PCR test will also be administered after arrival in South Korea.

More information:

https://www.mofa.go.kr/eng/brd/m_22742/list.do?page=1&srchFr=&srchTo=&srchWord=&srchTp=&multi_itm_seq=0&itm_seq_1=0&itm_seq_2=0&company_cd=&company_nm=

----------------------------

ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡¸ Spain

Effective Date:    Dec 3, 2022

Travelers arriving from:  Mainland China

Testing Requirement:  Negative PCR or Supervised RAT Test 72-Hours Prior to Flight Departure or person must be fully vaccinated.

More information:   No official information published.

----------------------------

ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡¼ Taiwan

Effective Date:    Jan 1, 2023

Travelers arriving from:  Mainland China

Testing Requirement:  PCR Test on arrival for all passengers

at airports and seaports.

More information:

https://www.cdc.gov.tw/En/Category/ListContent/tov1jahKUv8RGSbvmzLwFg?uaid=jYPaWZ5jNAanSZRMpP1XgA

----------------------------

ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ United Kingdom

Effective Date:    Jan 5, 2023

Travelers arriving from:    Mainland China

Testing Requirement:  Negative PCR or Supervised RAT Test 48-Hours Prior to Flight Departure. Passengers who have tested positive in the last 10 days can provide a recovery document. Starting on Jan 8, UK Health Agency will be testing a sample of passengers from China on arrival.

More information:

https://www.gov.uk/government/news/precautionary-and-temporary-measures-introduced-to-improve-covid-surveillance-from-china

----------------------------

ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ United States of America

Effective Date:    Jan 5, 2023

Travelers arriving from:    Mainland China, Hong Kong and Macau

Testing Requirement:  Negative PCR or Supervised RAT Test 48-Hours Prior to Flight Departure. Passengers who have tested positive in the last 10 days can provide a recovery document.

More information:

https://www.cdc.gov/media/releases/2022/p1228-COVID-china.html

[10/1/2023, 2:02:27â€¯PM] ~â€¯Raghav Rao: Two-Step Verification: How to Lock Whatsapp with Password on iPhone and Android
To lock your Whatsapp account with a password on iPhone and Android is by using Two-Step Verification. Therefore follow these steps:

Open your WhatsApp and tap the option icon at the top.
Tap Settings.
Tap Account.
Then, tap Two-step verification and Enable.
Enter a six-digit PIN of your choice and confirm it.
Also, provide an email address or tap Skip if you donâ€™t want to add an email address.
Tap Next.
Confirm the email address and tap Save or Done.
It is recommended you add an email address. This is useful when you want to reset the PIN or password either because you forget or it is no more secret.

If there is one thing to prevent your WhatsApp from hacking, it is by enabling the Two-Step Verification

[20/1/2023, 4:22:05â€¯PM] ~â€¯Siva: Can an NRI apply for Aadhaar?
YES. An NRI (whether minor or adult) with a valid Indian Passport can apply for Aadhaar from any Aadhaar Kendra.
[20/1/2023, 4:22:24â€¯PM] ~â€¯Siva: Above in government website uidai.gov.in
[20/1/2023, 4:23:20â€¯PM] ~â€¯Siva: They need a local address proof and can done at any post office and they take a IRIS scan and fingerprinting just takes a day to finish and collection can be done at postal address by a representative
[20/1/2023, 4:26:21â€¯PM] ~â€¯Siva: What is the process for Aadhaar enrolment for children of NRIs?keyboard_arrow_up
Pls refer to the below:

Child is below 5 years of age:

One of the parents/ guardian has to authenticate on behalf of the child and also give consent for enrolment of the minor by signing the enrolment form.
If the child is an NRI - valid Indian passport of the child is mandatory as Proof of Identity (PoI)
If the child is an Indian resident (not NRI) - any valid Proof of Relationship document (refer: https://uidai.gov.in/images/commdoc/valid_documents_list.pdf) such as Birth Certificate, along with Aadhaar of the parent/ guardian, can be used for enrolment.
Child is between 5 to 18 years of age:

One of the parents/ guardian has to give consent for enrolment of the minor by signing the enrolment form.
If the minor is an NRI â€“ valid Indian passport of the child is mandatory as Proof of Identity (PoI)
If the minor is an Indian resident (not NRI) -
No document in the name of the minor: any valid Proof of Relationship document (refer: https://uidai.gov.in/images/commdoc/valid_documents_list.pdf) such as Birth certificate can be used for enrolment under Head of Family.
Minor has a document: use a valid Proof of Identity (PoI) and Proof of Address (PoA) document (like School ID card) in the childâ€™s name for enrolment (refer: https://uidai.gov.in/images/commdoc/valid_documents_list.pdf).

[20/1/2023, 6:29:36â€¯PM] ~â€¯Vaibhav: NRIs, although they are citizens of India, are not eligible for Aadhaar Card if they have not stayed for more than 182 days or more in the last 12 months.  Upon completion of 182 days of their stay in India in the last 12 months immediately preceding the date of application for enrolment, NRIs can apply for Aadhaar Card.

- *NO MORE FREE ADVT*

*NO MORE PARTICULAR DAY*


Pls Read below - if you have skipped last 10 /more postings












 *MAJOR CHANGES TO REAL ESTATE AND BUSINESS ADVERTISING* 

Effective from 1st September 2022, all business and real estate advertisers must make a *minimum deposit of HKD50 to a CHARITABLE ORGANIZATION registered UNDER section 88, Inland Revenue Department Cap. 112* in order to post their advertisement in the Help Group.

Please note that *NO money should be transferred to any of the admins* nor do the admins gain any financial incentive from this plan of action.  This step is just in line with the long-term endeavor of the Help Group to continually extend helping hands to people in need. 

Posting details: 

â€¢	All forms of advertising (Rent /Sell residential /commercial property or promote your products/service / any commercial activity and second hand sales) can be done ONLY upon making a charitable donation of HKD50 (minimum value per donation). It cannot be posted directly by you /others except ADMINS.

â€¢	Only one photo with or without a short message containing contact information is allowed. No videos, pdfs, documents allowed. 

â€¢	Minimum HKD50 to be paid to the charitable organization for each advertisement (ONETIME PAYMENT = ONETIME ADVERTISEMENT PERMITTED).

â€¢	One-time donations made of a larger value (greater than HKD50) cannot be used for multiple advertisement postings. The admins do not have the scope to keep a record of the pending amount in the donations made with the number of advertisements posted. (ONETIME PAYMENT of HKD50 or more = ONETIME ADVERTISEMENT PERMITTED).

â€¢	From 1st September 2022, no more Fridays and once in a month advertisement issue as sometimes few misses the day. Advertisements can be posted on any day of the month depending on the charitable donation made. 

â€¢	For all remittances made, if possible,kindly mention â€œHELP GROUPâ€ so that the charitable organization is aware of the source. 

â€¢	Following registered charitable organizations run by Indians are recommended (alphabetical order), but you are free to contribute to any REGISTERED CHARITABLE ORGANIZATION

1. *BE THE CHANGE HONG KONG LIMITED* (w.e.f. 09.10.2020)
https://www.bethechangehk.org/donations/
+85292005797

2.*ERASE POVERTY* (HONG KONG w.e.f. 21.07.2012)

It takes 9 long months of rigours and mental and physical pain to bring a living human being into this world to face the complexities of the daily life but it just takes 9 minutes for these unforgivable criminals to trade and traffic that precious human life. Trading and Trafficking Human life goes back a long way since the inception of human race. Together, lets value and create a world free from the horrors and traumas of human trafficking. Human traffickers rely on exploiting vulnerable individuals and the lack of public awareness to continue their abhorrent crimes. Letâ€™s run for this noble cause. Letâ€™s encourage and participate in what ever small way we can in this fight against human trafficking by offering our small contribution towards this noble cause and help make a difference in the lives of those affected by this heinous crime and prevention which requires sincere efforts, time and resources for providing even the basic means to the affected and traumatised victims. 

Here is an earnest appeal to one and all to make a generous contribution within your means towards raising the funding for services and initiatives designed to prevent human trafficking at its grass route levels and provide medical, psychological and legal help for victims and spread public awareness. With your small help, we can break the chains of human trafficking and empower those affected and lead a normal life like you and me in what ever small way we can HELP. 

Every donation, no matter the size, can make a huge difference to the lives of affected victims. Come join hands with us in our fight against human trafficking and donate now. 

Your support will go a long way to help in an attempt to create a world free of this unpardonable crime where the vulnerable are protected and human traffickers are brought to justice. Together letâ€™s try our best to wipe out human trafficking for good.

*DIGITAL FREELANCING SCAM*
*JObSCAM*
*HOTEL / FLIGHT BOOKING SCAM*
*PART TIME WORK SCAM*
*CRYPTO SCAM*
*MANY MORE*

Few people r sending me some msg.  And asking if itâ€™s scam as they r asking only for my bank account- they start like this and eventually make u tempted n asks for small amount 

*NEVER ENTER ANY*

Very happy to know that few people saved their money from THOSE CHEATING GANGS and hope more and more becomes aware , so I am going to post this msg continuously as many of our friends donâ€™t scroll old msg - pls forward to all groups -

One tip in IT / part time job is the person gives you a task and asks u to deposit a small amount , donâ€™t get into it

Some sends invite code for u to participate 

These are what I learnt from our friends 

â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”
One of my friend working in lawyers office told me yesterday one indian came to their office saying he has lost *HKD2,000,000*

While discussing other person said someone lost *INR 30,00,000* by borrowing money by lodging his property 

One person from help group 1 said his friend lost *HKD600,000*

I am really confused how people can give money and fall in these scams

We have discussed this earlier but this needs more awakening, never pay money to get part time work and they pull you inside until you lose big money by tempting you

*NEVER SPARE A PENNY* to any stranger.
Donâ€™t get excited , too many scams around on social media

Be aware of asking for your *CREDIT CARD*  one of my friend told me someone posing like a Marriott staff offered some nice packages and he stopped as she had all his details except his email ID, and luckily escaped from giving his credit card , even though they ask u for small, they will charge big amount. 

Hope we wonâ€™t hear anymore, we need to educate our friends/relatives.


Please spread this to ALL YOUR FRIENDS , HK, India , everywhereâ€¦.

Thanks

Dear Friends,

Are you a
 *Yoga enthusiasts,* 

then Join a *World Record Breaking* Event on 6th May 2023.

 Yau Tsim Wong Home Affairs Department 
are jointly organizing  
" *YTM Wellness Gala* ", 
a large-scale World Record Breaking outdoor activity, in hope to promote
the physical and mental health of citizens through exercise. 

 *Wheel Yoga pair exercise*

 While relieving
stress and smoothing the mind,  we can also publicize the concept of sports and
inclusiveness into different sectors of society. 

pair can be your children,  spouse, friends, join, enjoy together and achieve the World Record tooğŸ¥³

Date: 6 May 2023 (Saturday)

Location: West Kowloon Cultural District (Art Park) 

Time: 2pm-4pm 

Fee: $200 for a pair (Fee waived if recommended by Ethnic Minorities Service Centre)

Each pair consist of 2 participants. Both participants must apply though the link above before 21/4 (application includes a souvenir / Worldâ€™s Record Breaking certificate)

You can write EMSC at the organisation blank and get a waiver of $200 registration fees.

for more information please check the online form and contact the organizer directly.

please share with your friends, come and enjoy a quality time with Family and Friend's.

You will collaborate with a multidisciplinary team to design, develop, and deploy AR applications across various platforms.

Responsibilities:

Collaborate with designers, artists, and other developers to create engaging AR content
Implement AR functionalities and features using relevant software development tools and frameworks
Optimize AR applications for performance, stability, and user experience
Integrate AR applications with backend systems and APIs
Conduct testing, debugging, and troubleshooting to ensure high-quality AR experiences
Stay up-to-date with the latest AR technologies, tools, and trends
Provide technical expertise and guidance on AR development best practices
Work closely with project managers and stakeholders to define project requirements and milestones
Participate in code reviews and contribute to the continuous improvement of the development process

Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field

Proficiency in programming languages such as C#, C++, or Java
Solid understanding of computer vision, 3D graphics, and spatial mapping concepts
Familiarity with Unity or other game engines for AR development
Knowledge of mobile development platforms (iOS and Android)
Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git)
Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills
Strong communication and teamwork abilities
A portfolio or examples of previous AR projects is highly desirable
If you are passionate about augmented reality and want to contribute to creating immersive interactive experiences, we would love to hear from you. Please submit your application with your resume, portfolio, and any other relevant materials showcasing your AR development skills. We look forward to discussing this exciting opportunity with you!

*PART TIME WORK SCAM*

Some sends invite code for u to participate 

These are what I learnt from our friends 

â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”
One of my friend working in lawyers office told me yesterday one indian came to their office saying he has lost *HKD2,000,000*

One person from help group 1 said his friend lost *HKD600,000*

I am really confused how people can give money and fall in these scams

We have discussed this earlier but this needs more awakening, never pay money to get part time work and they pull you inside until you lose big money by tempting you

*NEVER SPARE A PENNY* to any stranger.
Donâ€™t get excited , too many scams around on social media
